Headline: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove, #6 Jackson Park Express & #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: 3 King Dr, 4 Cott Grv, 6 Jksn Park Exp & J14 Jeff Jump Exp buses rerouted NB: Mchgn, Rsm't, State, Monroe & Mchgn; SB: Mchgn, Madison, State, Rsm't & Mchgn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove, #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Monroe and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Madison, State, Roosevelt and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
